thread.section_title: Adver-T Screen Printing and Embroidery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Adver-T Screen Printing and Embroidery | advertscreenprinting.com
thread.title: Jeff
thread.title_full: Adver-T Screen Printing and Embroidery reviewed by Jeff

author: Jeff
title: Jeff
text: We ordered Tshirts at the last minute and Brian at advertee screen printing got them to us the very next day. The shirts themselves were perfect there was an error in the quantity by one and Brian offered to print the missing shirt and overnight it but last ups does not offer Saturday delivery in our area. The refunded us the one shirt. This is a great company to work with.
